name: Anomalous (DEMO)
description: Anomalous is a new take on the Horror RPG genre that I have been waiting to see, but decided to just make myself. After your car breaks down on the side of the road in the woods, you find a path that leads to a cabin, but that is where your terrifying journey begins. You are armed with only a flashlight and your wits. You must figure out what happened here if you are to escape. With a wide range of game interaction and unique terrifying locations, your heart is sure to be pounding out of your chest the whole time. This is a very early access of the game and I am still implementing a lot of new features, enemies, systems, and visuals.  P.S. All profits are going to be used to help further development of the game.
